title: LFM (high elo) Ranked 5s Team
body: Hi I'm a s3 gold, s4 diamond and currently d5 top/jungle main looking for players for a 5s team. Looking to play regularly, have fun and improve while working on teamwork overall and all the while climbing the 5s ladder. Add me in game ("Free") if interested or post below with your IGN, rank, main position and times you can play.

replies.body:
Aye, IGN: Pantster, PLat 5 and main supp/mid (however practicing a lot of jg lately)
Added you in game, I'm free most weeknights and keen.

IGN: The Copy Cat
Rank: Plat 2
Main: adc
Times: everyday except wednesday

IGN; Kikkoo
Rank: Diamond V
Main Position: any 
Times: any day apart from tues after 5 (sat sund after 1pm )
